text: Volbeat is an Danish heavy metal band from Copenhagen. Volbeat formed in 2001 when singer Michael Poulsen formed a death metal band called Dominus. He became tired of the death metal genre and left the band. He then formed a new band called Volbeat with other members of Dominus. == Discography== === Albums === * The Strength / The Sound / The Songs (2005) * Rock the Rebel / Metal the Devil (2007) * Guitar Gangsters & Cadillac Blood (2008) * Beyond Hell/Above Heaven (2010) * Outlaw Gentlemen & Shady Ladies (2013) * Seal the Deal & Let's Boogie (2016) * Rewind, Replay, Rebound (2019) * Servant of the Mind (2021) == Other websites == *Volbeat's Official website Category:2001 establishments in Europe Category:2000s establishments in Denmark Category:Danish heavy metal bands Category:Musical groups from Copenhagen Category:2000s music groups Category:2010s music groups Category:Musical groups established in 2001
title: Volbeat
